resources.string: While screen is on, flipping the phone so the screen is facing downwards will turn screen off
While screen is on, flipping the phone so the screen is facing downwards will turn screen off. Place the phone vertically in a pocket to turn the screen off too.
You can put the mobile phone vertically into a pocket and it will automatically turn off the screen
You can put the mobile phone vertically into a pocket and it will automatically turn off the screen
